name: SENTIO VR
summary: SENTIO VR is the preferred 3D visualization platform for professionals working in the Architecture, Engineering & Construction Industry in 100+ countries. How does a project that has not yet been built look like? Instead of reviewing 2D floorplans, renders & video walkthroughs - SENTIO VR customers put on an Oculus Quest headset for real-time feedback with clients, improved designs & win new projects.
